resources.string: Are you the victim? Do you need medical help? Press Voulume Up button if your answer is YES. Press the Voulume Down button if your answer is NO. Touch the screen to repeat the question.

Please calm down and stay awake. Medical help is on the way. You need to answer the following questions with YES or NO. If your answer is YES, press the Volume Up button. If your answer is NO, press the Volume Down button. To repeat the question, just touch anywhere on the screen.
Are you clear with the Instructions? Answer YES or NO
Do you feel any pain in the heart region? Does it feel like your heart is stopping?
You are going to be fine. Are you finding it difficult to breathe?
You are doing great. Have you been subjected to some kind of poison?
Now listen carefully and answer this question. Are you losing your consciousness ? Do you feel like you are fainting?
Is there some kind of chest pain? Is your lungs getting heavier?
Do you have any injury in the head?
There is nothing to worry. Do you have any injury in the neck?
Do you have any kind of injury in your stomach?
Do you have any kind of injury in any of your hands?
You are perfectly fine. Do you any injury in any of your legs?
Do you have any injury in the back?Is there some kind of back pain?
